summary:
Did you ever feel like it was Tedious to play as a Conjurer?
I can tell you that I did. Bored the \\\"F\\\" out of me.
So this mod brings you a twist to that matter.
In fact, I\\\'m really proud to announce this episode because
it is by far the most advanced mod I have created so far.
descriptionHtml:
[h1]NEWS FLASH: I\'ll be on a skieing trip from February 15th till February 24th![/h1]

[b]The \\\"Mind\\\" series currently include:[/b]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=118250193]A Blood Benders Mind[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=123027495]A Keen Markmans Mind[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=124113739]A Dark Alchemists Mind[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=124781214]A True Hunters Mind[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=125789952]A Tedious Conjurers Mind[/url]


The fifth installment of the \\\"Mind\\\" series!
I am proud to reveal to you!

[b]\\\"A Tedious Conjurers Mind\\\"[/b]

Did you ever feel like it was Tedious to play as a Conjurer?
I can tell you that I did. Bored the \\\"F\\\" out of me.
So this mod brings you a twist to that matter.
In fact, I\\\'m really proud to announce this episode because
it is by far the most advanced mod I have created so far.

[b]WHAT DOES THIS MOD DO?[/b]
As much as I\\\'d like to keep most things a secret on this page.
I can imagine that you do not want to download/subscribe to a
mod of which you know nothing. So I\\\'ll give a small round-up and
together with the screenshots, enough should be revealed.

I can tell you that anyone that likes to summon creatures is going
to enjoy this mod thoroughly.

[b]ROUND UP:[/b]
Custom scripts
Custom textures
New spelltomes
New sanctuary
Lore-Friendly and high quality voice recording
Kick-off to a new story that will develop through out the series

[b]SOME DETAILS[/b]
• All summons will level up allong with you.
• Only one special creature may be selected at a time.

[b]SMALL CHANGES[/b]
Changed the \\\"Double souls\\\" perk into \\\"Unlimited Souls\\\".
Get the perk and you will be allowed up to 100 Summons at a time.

[b]FEATURED CREATURES[/b]
Custom/Special:
• Posessed Mammoth
• Posessed Giant
• Posessed Hagraven

• Sanctified Mammoth
• Sanctified Giant
• Sanctified Hagraven

Regular:
• Bear
• Centurion
• Chaurus Reaper
• Deer
• Dog
• Draugr Dwight
• Giant Frostbite Spider
• Ice Wolf
• Snowy Sabrecat
• Troll
• Werewolf

[b]WHERE TO START[/b]
This mod will explain itself very easy once you get the first and 
surely most important spellbook of this mod at [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Lost_Tongue_Overlook]\\\"Lost Tongue Overlook\\\"[/url]
(Console: coc dragonlair07exterior02)

NOTE: Be prepared to face a dragon!

~---~---~---~---~---~

[b]Skype:[/b] Dyramisty
[b]Facebook:[/b] [url=http://www.facebook.com/ddeheer]Dylan de Heer[/url]

[b]Skyrim Nexus:[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1384870]Dyramisty[/url]

~---~---~---~---~---~

[b]CHANGELOG:[/b] 
V1.0:
* Release

V1.2:
* Fixed minor bugs
* Added summon limitation to the \"Sanctified and Posessed\" creatures.
author: Dyramisty
